title: VCMI mod file format
description: Format used to define main mod file (mod.json) in VCMI

name.description: Short name of your mod. No more than 2-3 words

description.description: More lengthy description of mod. No hard limit

author.description: Author of the mod. Can be nickname, real name or name of team

changelog.description: List of changes/new features in each version

skipValidation.description: If set to true, vcmi will skip validation of current translation json files

translations.description: List of files with translations for this language

name.description: Short name of your mod. No more than 2-3 words

description.description: More lengthy description of mod. No hard limit

modType.description: Type of mod, e.g. Town, Artifacts, Graphical.

author.description: Author of the mod. Can be nickname, real name or name of team

downloadSize.description: Approximate size of mod, compressed by zip algorithm, in Mb

contact.description: Home page of mod or link to forum thread

licenseName.description: Name of the license, recommended is Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike

version.description: Current mod version, up to 3 numbers, dot-separated. Format: A.B.C

changelog.description: List of changes/new features in each version

min.description: minimal compatible vcmi engine version in a format major.minor.patch. When specified, earlier versions won't be supported

max.description: maximum compatible vcmi engine version in a format major.minor.patch. When specified, later versions won't be supported

depends.description: List of mods that are required to run this one

softDepends.description: List of mods if they are enabled, should be loaded before this one. This mod will overwrite any conflicting items from its soft dependency mods

conflicts.description: List of mods that can't be enabled in the same time as this one

keepDisabled.description: If set to true, mod will not be enabled automatically on install

settings.description: List of changed game settings by mod

filesystem.description: Optional, description on how files are organized in your mod. In most cases you do not need to use this field

additionalProperties.description: list of data sources attached to this mount point

language.description: Base language of the mod, before applying localizations. By default vcmi assumes English

translations.description: List of files with translations for this language

factions.description: List of configuration files for towns/factions

heroClasses.description: List of configuration files for hero classes

heroes.description: List of configuration files for heroes

skills.description: List of configuration files for skills

creatures.description: List of configuration files for creatures

artifacts.description: List of configuration files for artifacts

spells.description: List of configuration files for spells

objects.description: List of configuration files for objects

biomes.description: List of configuration files for biomes

bonuses.description: List of configuration files for bonuses

terrains.description: List of configuration files for terrains

roads.description: List of configuration files for roads

rivers.description: List of configuration files for rivers

battlefields.description: List of configuration files for battlefields

obstacles.description: List of configuration files for obstacles

templates.description: List of configuration files for RMG templates

scripts.description: List of configuration files for scripts
